Package cz.zcu.kiv.crce.repository

Interface Buffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Store
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferImpl
    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface Buffer
extends Store
    This interface defines a temporary store for uploading artifacts before putting them to the permanent store.
    Author:
    Jiri Kucera (jiri.kucera@kalwi.eu)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Resource> commit​(boolean move)
      Commits uploaded resources to the configured store.
      List<Resource> commit​(List<Resource> resources, boolean move)
      Commits only the given resources to the configured store.
      Resource put​(String name, InputStream resource)
      Puts a new resource into resource buffer.

      • Methods inherited from interface cz.zcu.kiv.crce.repository.Store

        execute, getPossibleResources, getResource, getResources, getResources, getResources, put, remove

    • Method Detail

      • put

        @Nonnull
Resource put​(String name,
             InputStream resource)
      throws IOException,
             RefusedArtifactException
        Puts a new resource into resource buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - A name of uploaded file.
        resource - Uploaded resource.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
        RefusedArtifactException

      • commit

        @Nonnull
List<Resource> commit​(boolean move)
               throws IOException
        Commits uploaded resources to the configured store.

        If move is true then resources will be removed from the buffer. Returned list constains resources successfully commited to the store.

        Parameters:
        move - if true, commited resources are removed from the buffer.
        Returns:
        list of commited resources.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • commit

        @Nonnull
List<Resource> commit​(List<Resource> resources,
                      boolean move)
               throws IOException
        Commits only the given resources to the configured store.

        If move is true then resources will be removed from the buffer. Returned list constains resources successfully commited to the store.

        Parameters:
        resources -
        move -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
